lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps has emerged from one of the darkest periods of his life as a happy man and immersed himself in a career revival, which is bad news for anyone looking to spoil his bid for a glorious Olympic farewell.

headline.main: Rejuvenated Phelps Giving His All in Final Games Bid
headline.print_headline: Rejuvenated Phelps Giving His All in Final Games Bid

snippet: Michael Phelps has emerged from one of the darkest periods of his life as a happy man and immersed himself in a career revival, which is bad news for anyone looking to spoil his bid for a glorious Olympic farewell....
